languages.text: "Говорят, Лорд-капитан лично распорядил{mf|ся|ась} о прекращении побоев. Блюстители в ярости, а ослушаться не смеют".
"I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Говорят, Лорд-капитан лично распорядил{mf|ся|ась} о прекращении побоев. Блюстители в ярости, а ослушаться не смеют".

traits.locale_text: "I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."
"I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."
"I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. Mistress Sauerback can huff and puff all she wants, but she won't defy the Lord Captain."
"I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."
"I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."
"I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."
"I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."

languages.text: «He oído que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha ordenado personalmente que cesen las palizas. Los guardias pueden desgañitarse todo lo que quieran, pero no se atreverán a desafiar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «He oído que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha ordenado personalmente que cesen las palizas. Los guardias pueden desgañitarse todo lo que quieran, pero no se atreverán a desafiar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンが直々に、殴打を止めるよう命じたらしいな。エンフォーサーたちは好きなだけ暴れてもいいが、ロード・キャプテンだけには逆らえない」
languages.original_text: "I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンが直々に、殴打を止めるよう命じたらしいな。エンフォーサーたちは好きなだけ暴れてもいいが、ロード・キャプテンだけには逆らえない」

languages.text: “我听说舰长大人亲自下令，禁止执法者随便打人。那些执法者气得暴跳如雷，但他们不敢违逆舰长大人的命令。”
languages.original_text: "I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “我听说舰长大人亲自下令，禁止执法者随便打人。那些执法者气得暴跳如雷，但他们不敢违逆舰长大人的命令。”

languages.text: "Ich hörte, dass der Lord Captain persönlich die Einstellung der Prügel angeordnet hat. Die Enforcer können sich noch so sehr darüber aufregen. Sie werden sich dem Lord Captain nicht widersetzen."
languages.original_text: "I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hörte, dass der Lord Captain persönlich die Einstellung der Prügel angeordnet hat. Die Enforcer können sich noch so sehr darüber aufregen. Sie werden sich dem Lord Captain nicht widersetzen."

languages.text: « À ce qu'il paraît, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en personne aurait ordonné que les violences cessent. Les prévôts auront beau râler tant que ça peut, jamais ils n'oseront défier son autorité. »
languages.original_text: "I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « À ce qu'il paraît, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en personne aurait ordonné que les violences cessent. Les prévôts auront beau râler tant que ça peut, jamais ils n'oseront défier son autorité. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın dayakların kesilmesini bizzat emrettiğini duydum. İnfazcılar istedikleri kadar öfkelenebilirler. Lord Kaptan'a kafa tutacak değiller."
languages.original_text: "I heard the Lord Captain personally ordered that the beatings be stopped. The enforcers can rage all they want, but they won't defy the Lord Captain."
